intent_atoms.description: VR-018 codec errors must propagate through the streaming pipeline and be reported by isoinspect validate command.
As a developer, I want sample encryption metadata (senc/saio/saiz) to be surfaced in JSON exports, CLI summaries, and SwiftUI detail views so that it is visible and accessible.

The JSONParseTreeExporter must include sample encryption metadata; EventConsoleFormatter must output CLI summaries containing these metadata; ParseTreeDetailView must render the metadata with refreshed accessibility summaries.
All placeholder metadata for sample encryption must be visible in the exported JSON and CLI outputs.
Introduce a new fixture called 'codec-invalid-configs' to test coverage of VR-018 errors across ParsePipeline, CLI validate output, and JSON snapshot baseline.

functional_units.name: Codec Validation Coverage Expansion
functional_units.description: Provides comprehensive codec diagnostics across ParsePipeline, CLI validate output, and JSON export snapshots using the `codec-invalid-configs` fixture.

functional_units.name: Surface Sample Encryption Metadata Propagation
functional_units.description: Propagates `senc`, `saio`, and `saiz` placeholder metadata into JSON exports, CLI summaries, and SwiftUI detail views with accessibility coverage.

functional_units.name: Sample Encryption Placeholder Validation
functional_units.description: Validates visibility of sample encryption placeholders using the `sample-encryption-placeholder` fixture across ParsePipeline, CLI/App regression, JSON snapshot baseline, and documentation.

functional_units.name: CLI Validate Command Codec Warning Reporting
functional_units.description: The `isoinspect validate` CLI command emits codec warnings (VR-018 errors) when running against fixtures.

functional_units.name: JSON Exporter Inclusion of Sample Encryption Metadata
functional_units.description: JSONParseTreeExporter includes sample encryption metadata in exported JSON snapshots.

functional_units.name: Event Console Formatter for CLI Summaries
functional_units.description: Formats and outputs CLI summaries, including sample encryption metadata, via EventConsoleFormatter.

functional_units.name: Parse Tree Detail View Rendering
functional_units.description: Renders encryption metadata inside ParseTreeDetailView SwiftUI component with accessibility summaries.
